text: "Promises" is the title of a 1981 song by Barbra Streisand. The song was written by Barry Gibb and Robin Gibb, who also provide backing vocals. It was the fourth of four singles released from her album Guilty. "Promises" narrowly missed the Pop Top 40 in the U.S., peaking at number 48.
